name: D-login
author: DYTRI

sections.description:
This small plugin helps you to do on your site can register and authorize users without the standard form of WordPress, and as to issue a block to display the logged user’s site in the form of “Hi, User!”. The plugin include short codes, that you can use on your pages. You just prescribe the correct code and the page will automatically display the specified form. Initially, D-login is not using their styles, so you have to set up their own so-, as you will need. D-login the perfect choice for your website, all the more so, that it is completely free!

ShortCodes

  • dloginuser – displays the login form
  • dreguser – displays a registration form

Features

  • Authorization
  • Registration
  • Password recovery
  • Antispam

More information can be found on the home page plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enable and configure widgets.
